string-array.name: guided_activities_details
string-array.item: {"type": "GRID", "description": \"Llévalo hasta la casilla musical\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Llévalo a descansar, comer y jugar\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Lleva a Zowi a darse un baño\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}

{"type": "SEEDS", "description": \"Planta las semillas en sus hoyos correspondientes\", "seedsImages": [[seeds_seed_yellow, seeds_seed_yellow, seeds_seed_yellow, seeds_seed_yellow], [seeds_seed_orange, seeds_seed_orange, seeds_seed_orange, seeds_seed_orange], [seeds_seed_pink, seeds_seed_pink, seeds_seed_pink, seeds_seed_pink], [seeds_seed_brown, seeds_seed_brown, seeds_seed_brown, seeds_seed_brown]], "containerImages": [seeds_container_yellow, seeds_container_orange, seeds_container_pink, seeds_container_brown], "correction": [YELLOW, ORANGE, PINK, BROWN]}

{"type": "COLUMNS", "description": \"Coloca en cada columna lo que debemos hacer antes y después de comer\", "leftTitle": \"Antes\", "rightTitle": \"Después\", "images": [[columns_before_set_table, columns_before_cook, columns_before_wash_hands], [columns_after_brush_teeth, columns_after_clean_table, columns_after_washing_up]], "correction": [LEFT, RIGHT]}
{"type": "OPERATIONS", "description": \"Resuelve las sumas y restas y consigue todos los dientes que faltan\", "operationsType": 1, "image": "zowi_teeth", "operationsImages": []}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Lleva a Zowi a resolver las adivinanzas\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Lleva a Zowi a desayunar\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Busca las frutas\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Elabora tus recetas con: pan, huevos, tomate y arroz\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}

{"type": "FOODPYRAMID", "description": \"Completa la pirámide con los alimentos en su lugar\", "images": [[food_pyramid_cereals, food_pyramid_rice, food_pyramid_bread, food_pyramid_pasta], [sandia, platano, manzana, naranja], [pimiento, cebolla, berenjena, zanahoria], [carne, frutos_secos, pollo, huevos], [petit_suit, yogurt_natural, leche, queso], [aceite, helado, mantequilla, tarta]], "correction": [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]}

{"type": "DRAG", "description": \"Ordena los momentos de alimentación del día\", "dragImages": [[breakfast], [luncheon], [lunch], [snack], [dinner]], "dragImagesNumber": 5, "correction": [BREAKFAST, LUNCHEON, LUNCH, SNACK, DINNER], "containerElements": 5, "containerImages": [], "texts": [\"Desayuno\", \"Tentempié\", \"Comida\", \"Merienda\", \"Cena\"]}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Llévalo hasta la casilla musical\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Lleva a Zowi con su mamá\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Ayuda a Zowi a encontrar a su hermano\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"type": "OPERATIONS", "description": \"Realiza las operaciones del tema\", "operationsType": 1, "image": "operations_main_family", "operationsImages": []}

{"type": "PUZZLE", "description": \"Construye el rompecabezas de la familia de Zowi\", "images": [[puzzle_family_1_1, puzzle_family_2_1], [puzzle_family_1_2, puzzle_family_2_2], [puzzle_family_1_3, puzzle_family_2_3]]}
{"type": "MEMORY", "description": \"Busca y encuentra todas las parejas\", "images": [memory_family, memory_family_2, memory_family_3, memory_family_4, memory_mum, memory_granny]}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Llévalo a la casilla musical\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"type": "GUIDE", "description": \"Guía a Zowi con tu mano y llévalo a casa\", "images": [[guide_house_1], [guide_zowi_house], [guide_house_2], [guide_house_3]], "correction": [0, 1, 0, 0]}

{"type": "ZOWI_EYES", "description": \"Identifica los elementos de la casa\", "imagesNumber": [3, 3], "images": [[unit_4_bed, unit_4_coffee_maker, unit_4_kitchen_tools, unit_4_lamp, unit_4_sofa, unit_4_wardrobe], [naranja, columns_after_brush_teeth, food_pyramid_rice]]}

{"type": "DRAG", "description": \"Arrastra los muebles a su lugar de la casa\", "dragImages": [[unit_4_sofa, unit_4_shelves, unit_4_lamp], [unit_4_kitchen_tools, unit_4_coffee_maker, unit_4_chair], [unit_4_bed, unit_4_wardrobe, unit_4_desk]], "dragImagesNumber": 7, "correction": [LIVING_ROOM, KITCHEN, BEDROOM], "containerElements": 3, "containerImages": [], "texts": ["Salón", "Cocina", "Habitación"]}

{"type": "PUZZLE", "description": \"Construye el rompecabezas de la casa de Zowi\", "images": [[puzzle_home_1_1, puzzle_home_2_1], [puzzle_home_2_1, puzzle_home_2_2], [puzzle_home_1_3, puzzle_home_2_3]]}

{"type": "OPERATIONS", "description": \"Resuelve las sumas y restas con los objetos de la casa\", "operationsType": 2, "image": "zowi_teeth", "operationsImages": [unit_4_bed, unit_4_desk, unit_4_lamp, unit_4_sofa, unit_4_wardrobe, unit_4_kitchen_tools]}
{"type": "GRID", "description": \"Llévalo a la casilla musical\", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"type": "MUSIC", "description": \"Toca el instrumento siguiendo el dictado musical\", "images": [dictation_1, dictation_2, dictation_3, dictation_4, dictation_5]}

{"type": "COLOURED_GRID", "description": \"Lleva a Zowi al colegio. Elige el camino más corto\", "cells": [[2, 13], [1, 10], [8, 11]], "images": [house, zowi_pointer], "colouredCells": [[GREEN, GREEN, BLANK, RED, GREEN, BLANK, BLUE, RED, GREEN, BLUE, BLUE, RED, GREEN, BLANK, RED, RED], [BLUE, BLANK, GREEN, GREEN, BLUE, RED, RED, GREEN, BLUE, BLUE, BLANK, GREEN, BLANK, BLUE, BLUE, BLANK], [GREEN, GREEN, GREEN, GREEN, GREEN, BLANK, BLANK, GREEN, BLANK, BLUE, BLUE, BLANK, RED, RED, RED, RED]]}

{"type": "OPERATIONS", "description": \"Resuelve las sumas y restas con los objetos del colegio\", "operationsType": 2, "image": "zowi_teeth", "operationsImages": [house, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer]}

{"type": "PUZZLE", "description": \"Construye el rompecabezas del colegio\", "images": [[puzzle_school_1_1, puzzle_school_2_1], [puzzle_school_2_1, puzzle_school_2_2], [puzzle_school_1_3, puzzle_school_2_3]]}

{"type": "COLUMNS", "description": \"Arrastra cada acción a su columna\", "leftTitle": \"Lo que debemos hacer en el aula\", "rightTitle": \"Lo que no debemos hacer en el aula\", "images": [[zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer], [house, house, house, house]], "correction": [LEFT, RIGHT]}

string-array.item: {"type": "LOGIC_BLOCKS", "description": \"¡Identifica la imagen correspondiente al tema!\", "images": [triangulo_rojo_grande, cuadrado_verde_grande, triangulo_rojo_pequeno, cuadrado_azul_grande, cuadrado_azul_pequeno, cuadrado_verde_pequeno, circulo_amarillo_grande, circulo_amarillo_pequeno]}
